Name: Clipperton Island
Constitutional status: State private property under the direct authority of the French government

Name: French Polynesia
Constitutional status: Designated as an overseas land (pays doutre-mer or POM), the status is the same as an overseas collectivity.

Name: Saint Pierre and Miquelonlocal
Constitutional status: Overseas collectivity (collectivité doutre-mer or COM). Still referred to as a collectivité territoriale.

Name: Wallis and Futunalocal
Constitutional status: Overseas collectivity (collectivité doutre-mer or COM). Still referred to as a territoire.
